intro: Elatostema clemensii, commonly known as the small-leaved elatostema, is a herbaceous plant native to Southeast Asia. It belongs to the family Urticaceae, which includes nettle and related plants. The plant features small, elliptical leaves with a smooth texture and a tendency to curl when touched. It produces tiny, greenish-white flowers that are clustered in dense inflorescences. Elatostema clemensii is often found in moist, shaded environments such as forests and stream banks.
